Software

Check it out some of my open-source projects:

ddfenics

ddfenics

A FEniCS-based (Model-Free) Data-driven Computational Mechanics implementation.

micmacsfenics

micmacsfenics

A FEniCS-based implementation of two-level finite element simulations (FE2) using computational homogenization.

fetricks

fetricks

Useful tricks and some extensions for FEniCs and other FEM-related utilities (fe + tricks: where "fe" stands for FEM, FEniCs and me :).
